m

here 
ever they are, He will use Holy Spirit to do this, HS is the  most po=
werful 
force in the Universe, He can be a soft as a kitten's fur, and  tou=
gher than 
molten lava! 
 
After the dead rise they will form into new  bod=
y's spirit type, but 
different then the way it is now, we who are in  body=

in essence we will die, so quickly we will n=
ot  realize what happened, and 
will leave the physical world, the physical=
 body  changes, and we become a 
new physical/spirit being and we will be t=
aken into  Heaven for about 2.5 
years it would have been 3 full years our =
time, but it's  been moved up 
somewhat.
 
People left on Earth will have a=
 terrible time  here, with wars, no food, 
water, you know the rest...about=
 that time the  antichrist will step in to 
control Europe, David told me, =
the antichrist will  not get the US, Canada, 
England, Australia, or even R=
ussia, because these  countries will give him too

rist was some man born  in Spain, and is now living

ears old right now, and he  will come into power by

ny at first he will be a nice guy,  fooling all

ntioned.
 
After a couple years he will demand to be  worshiped as God, and=

people believe he is JC, though many will not  believe it, and =
it will be

e for

der his spell.  
He will some how get a massive war started up, but  he won=

very long though, because the real Jesus will then return=

must be gonna be some kind of event horizon or something=

rebuild the Earth, set up His place of residence in  =

t type  body's, if you lost 
a tooth in the current body, you will have a n=
ew tooth back,  if you lost a 
limb, that limb will be back, but the new ph=
ysical/spiritual type  body's 
will be stronger, and last us, JC will be he=
re living with us for 1000  years 
our time, after that, is when He will re=
turn into the spiritual side  
again, then afterward will return a differen=
t type of person, He will become  
different in personality, and because, H=
e now must be "The Judge."    (His 
current personality is much too kind, h=
eck he is letting people into the  now if 
they are sincere with apology an=
d repent from how they acted, and are  
willing to make up for crimes done.=
  Those who are Christian now, will not  be 
in that long line in darkness,=
 now when they die, they are automatically in  
light, that's why prayers, =
and leading them toward the light now does help 
those  in darkness now to =
get "go to the light."  We hear them begging us for 
help  everyday we turn=
 on a "ghost box.")
 
This is when He judges the world, and those not  livi=
ng in light, will get 
stuck in total darkness, they will not suffer throug=
h  torture, God is not 
into the torture thing, that is lies of Church to c=
ontrol  the people for 
years, heck, God didn't even enjoy those burnt offe=
rings, that is  why He came 
to us through JC in the first place so, it wou=
ldn't happen anymore,  but 
some do not believe in what He did.  Those that=

the Naphilim  did in the time of Noah, th=
e energy from  their spirit's just 
changed into something else or He took =
it back since He can  make evil 
change into good things too.  While we are=
 being judged, one at a  time, that 
will take a long time too, He does the=
 same thing now, that is why  the line 
of those in spirit darkness is so l=
ong, David the Tech told me, and my  son 
and grandson one day, that JC wor=
ks pretty much 24/7 taking people into the  
light, they enter, repent (say=
 they are sorry) and mean it, then He talks 
with  each person one at a tim=
e, taking about 10 minutes our time with each 
spirit,  that person's guard=
ian angel go into another room to talk, the Angel 
opens a  "book of life" =
for that spirit, and they talk about what must be 
made up over  there, the=
n the loved ones, and pets  meet up, they all go into  
another room to tal=
k about things, then that person goes to their living 
place,  given consul=
 or whatever, some even go to school again, while others 
must serve  out s=
entences in a prison but at least that prison is in the 
light, it is where=
  they get those things they need to live on, some are still 
in need of de=
veloping  a conscience, something they never developed on earth 
when they =
were  here.
 
After He is finished judging this world, I was  told He will =
get to work 
with that planet we call Jupiter!  Cool eh?   He will put wate=
r on it first 
thing, it will take many thousands of years, but  it will de=
velop into a great 
new planet to live on, I know sounds very far  fetched,=
 but this is what 
David the tech says, believe it or not!  We live  and di=
e on this planet is 
like a drop of sand in a bucket when compared  to eter=
nity.   David told me 
that "God wants family, and  only asks for our love =
and respect, when we love 
someone, we will respect that  person too."   So=
rry, I got so wordy, now you 
all can shoot me  down. <g>  sf
